me.desht.sensibletoolbox.api

Interface ItemRegistry


  • public interface ItemRegistry
    An interface to the STB item registry system, allow registration of new STB items and obtaining existing items.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • registerItem

        void registerItem(BaseSTBItem item,
                Plugin plugin)
        Register the given item as a Sensible Toolbox item.
        Parameters:
        item - an instance of the item to be registered
        plugin - the plugin which is registering the item.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied item is invalid in some way

      • registerItem

        void registerItem(BaseSTBItem item,
                Plugin plugin,
                String configPrefix)
        Register the given item as a Sensible Toolbox item.

        If the supplied configPrefix parameter is non-null, then the plugin's configuration, key configNode.[itemID], will be checked for a boolean value, which must return true for the item to be registered. This can be used to allow server admin control over which items are registered. [itemID] is the return value of BaseSTBItem.getItemTypeID()

        Parameters:
        item - an instance of the item to be registered
        plugin - the plugin which is registering the item.
        configPrefix - a configuration prefix
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied item is invalid in some way

      • registerItem

        void registerItem(BaseSTBItem item,
                Plugin plugin,
                String configPrefix,
                String permissionPrefix)
        Register the given item as a Sensible Toolbox item.

        If the supplied configPrefix parameter is non-null, then the plugin's configuration, key configNode.[itemID], will be checked for a boolean value, which must return true for the item to be registered. This can be used to allow server admin control over which items are registered. [itemID] is the return value of BaseSTBItem.getItemTypeID()

        If the supplied permissionPrefix parameter is non-null, it is used as the prefix to register the item's permission nodes, instead of the default "stb". See this page for more information on per-item permissions.

        Parameters:
        item - an instance of the item to be registered
        plugin - the plugin which is registering the item.
        configPrefix - a configuration prefix
        permissionPrefix - a permission node prefix
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the supplied item is invalid in some way

      • getItemIds

        Set<String> getItemIds()
        Get a set of all known STB item ID's.
        Returns:
        a set of all known STB item ID's

      • fromItemStack

        BaseSTBItem fromItemStack(ItemStack stack)
        Construct and return an STB item from a supplied ItemStack.
        Parameters:
        stack - the item stack
        Returns:
        the STB item, or null if the item stack is not an STB item

      • fromItemStack

        <T extends BaseSTBItem> T fromItemStack(ItemStack stack,
                                      Class<T> type)
        Construct and return an STB item from a supplied ItemStack. The item must be an instance of the supplied class or subclass of the supplied class.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the parameterised type; a subclass of BaseSTBItem
        Parameters:
        stack - the ItemStack
        type - the required class
        Returns:
        the STB item, or null if the item stack is not an STB item of the desired class

      • getItemById

        BaseSTBItem getItemById(String id)
        Construct and return an STB item.

        If you know the item ID in advance, it's a little quicker just to call new on the item class. This method is primarily to allow retrieval of STB items by dynamic item ID.

        Parameters:
        id - the item ID
        Returns:
        the STB item

      • getItemById

        BaseSTBItem getItemById(String id,
                      ConfigurationSection conf)
        Construct and return an STB item, restoring its settings from previously frozen data. The data will have been frozen by BaseSTBItem.freeze().
        Parameters:
        id - the item ID
        conf - item's frozen configuration data
        Returns:
        the STB item

      • isSTBItem

        boolean isSTBItem(ItemStack stack)
        Check if the given item stack is an STB item.
        Parameters:
        stack - the item stack to check
        Returns:
        true if this item stack is an STB item

      • isSTBItem

        boolean isSTBItem(ItemStack stack,
                Class<? extends BaseSTBItem> c)
        Check if the given item stack is an STB item of the given STB subclass.
        Parameters:
        stack - the item stack to check
        c - a subclass of BaseSTBItem
        Returns:
        true if this item stack is an STB item of (or extending) the given class
